claimModalFinePrint: 请注意： 领取宝石会开启分析功能，以便我们改进 Universe
claimModalText: 通过挖矿和推荐朋友在测试网期间增加您的空投奖励！有推荐码吗？在下方输入并为您和您的朋友额外赚取{{gems}}个宝石！
claimModalTitle: 在测试网挖矿赚取奖励
claimReferralCode: 领取您的推荐码{{gems}}宝石。
claimReferralGifts: 领取您的推荐码并赚取{{gems}}个宝石。一旦您连接账户，您将获得宝石。
giftReferralCode: 每邀请一位朋友加入Tari Universe，您将获得{{gems}}个宝石。一旦他们连接账户，您将获得宝石。
giftReferralCodeHeader: 领取您的推荐码{{gems}}宝石。
invite-friends-gems: 每个使用您邀请链接的朋友，您将获得5,000颗宝石。
joinAirdropButtonAriaLabel: 加入空投游戏并赚取宝石。右键单击以复制链接
keep-mining-to-earn-rewards: 继续挖矿以获得更多奖励！
nextTierBonus: 邀请{{count}}位朋友并赚取{{bonusGems}}个奖励宝石

permission.setup: Tari Universe希望使用分析来改善您的体验。
permission.text: Tari Universe希望使用分析来改善您的体验，并通过邀请朋友奖励您宝石。
permission.title: 赚取宝石并让 Tari Universe 更好

permissionNoGems.text: Tari Universe 希望使用分析数据来改善您的体验。
permissionNoGems.title: 让 Tari Universe 更好

push-notifications.text: Tari Universe希望能够向您的连接设备发送通知
push-notifications.title: 允许Tari Universe发送通知

topTooltipText: 通过收集宝石获得 Tari 空投。你赚取的宝石越多，空投就越大。
username-error: 用户名必须为 3-20 个字符，并且只能包含字母、数字、下划线或连字符
your-friend-accepted-gift: 您的朋友之一接受了您的礼物！

crewRewards.title: Rewards
crewRewards.earnDescription: Earn {{userReward}} XTM for every {{daysRequired}} days your friend mines. Your friend will also earn {{friendReward}} XTM.
crewRewards.inviteFriendsMessage: Invite friends and start earning bonus XTM!
crewRewards.errorLoadingData: Error loading crew data. Please try again.

streak.mineConsecutiveDays: Mine for at least {{streakDaysRequired}} consecutive days each week to earn your bonus XTM.
streak.keepStreak: Keep your streak to keep earning rewards!
streak.startMiningMessage: Start mining to begin your streak and earn rewards!
streak.minimumRequirementsMet: You've met the minimum requirements. Keep going!
streak.daysToMinimum: {{days}} more days to meet minimum requirements!

login.title: Mine with friends. Earn together.
login.description: You earn {{userReward}} bonus XTM/week AND your friend earns {{friendReward}} bonus XTM/week when you and your friend both mine
login.bonusText: Earn bonus rewards up to {{maxWeeks}} weeks per invite
